welcome.title: We're so happy to have you here!
welcome.description: Fill out this form to tell us about your business. With this information, our team will create your personalized AI agents.

alert.title: Complete your Onboarding
alert.description: Fill in your business information so we can configure your AI agents.

step1.title: About Your Company
step1.description: Tell us about what your company does. This helps us create authentic communication.

step2.title: About Your Customers
step2.description: Help us understand who your ideal customers are so we can find the right people.
step2.tip: Think about your best customers - those who are easy to work with, pay on time, and refer you to others. We want to find more people like them!

step3.title: Your Support
step3.description: Tell us how you serve your customers and what questions they usually have.

step4.title: Final Information
step4.description: Last pieces of information to complete your registration.
step4.nextStep2: We create your personalized AI agents
step4.nextStep3: We schedule a call to show everything working

fields.industry: What industry is your company in?
fields.productsServices: What are your main products or services?
fields.differentials: What makes your company different from others?
fields.successCases: Do you have any success stories or results to share?
fields.targetRoles: Who do you usually talk to to close a sale?
fields.targetLocation: What cities or regions do you serve?
fields.targetIndustries: What sectors or niches do you serve most?
fields.buyingSignals: How do you know someone needs your service?
fields.mainProblem: What is the main problem you solve?
fields.faq: What questions do your customers ask most frequently?
fields.objections: What are the most common objections you hear?
fields.policies: Are there any important policies that support needs to know?
fields.escalationTriggers: When should a conversation be passed to you?
fields.goals: What do you hope to achieve with GetRaze?
fields.leadTarget: How many new customers do you want per month?
fields.meetingTarget: How many meetings do you want to schedule per month?
fields.materialsLinks: Do you have any company materials we can use?
fields.calendarLink: Link to your calendar for scheduling
fields.blacklist: Is there anyone we should NOT contact?

hints.description: Explain as if you were telling someone who has never heard of your company
hints.productsServices: List the main ones, with a brief description and price (or price range)
hints.differentials: Why should a customer choose you over the competitor?
hints.successCases: Concrete results that your customers have achieved
hints.idealCustomer: What type of company or person would you like to serve more?
hints.targetRoles: What is the role or function of the decision maker?
hints.targetIndustries: List the types of companies you want to prospect
hints.buyingSignals: What signs show that a company needs your help?
hints.mainProblem: If you had to summarize it in one sentence, what would it be?
hints.faq: List the questions you always answer and how you answer them
hints.objections: What do people say when they don't want to buy? And how do you respond?
hints.policies: Rules about discounts, deadlines, payment methods, warranties, etc.
hints.escalationTriggers: At what point should the agent call a human?
hints.materialsLinks: Links to presentations, videos, website, etc.
hints.calendarLink: If you use Calendly, Google Calendar, or similar
